txt.en: You suddenly realize that this sudden burst of frosty air might not be mere coincidence.\n\nYou begin to shiver.
'Ah! I knew someone would find us. It is too late for me, but not for the others....'
The snows have begun again in Byre Tor...a fierce storm, which likely means one thing. NÃºrzum is near.
You brace yourself as a rush of cold air passes you.
Talk to someone in the cave
A cave full of grim-looking people stands in the High Knolls north of Byre Tor.\n\nYou should speak with one of the people.
A cave full of grim-looking people stands in the High Knolls north of Byre Tor.\n\nYou should speak with one of the people.
Strange weather has cropped up in Byre Tor.\n\nSomething is wrong....
A tall craggy peak stands to the north-east.\n\nYou should head to the high peak, away from Byre Tor, where your vantage point will be better.
Find out what caused the strange weather to appear in Byre Tor
Head North-east away from Byre Tor, to the tallest peak
